subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text: {{zh-ref|Schuessler (2007)}} compares this to {{cog|duu|sraŋ||morning}}, from {{cog|tbq-pro|*b/s-raŋ||morning, awake, alert}} as well as {{cog|km|ស្រាង||to be dim / faint (of early morning light); to glimmer}}. Possibly of part of an {{der|zh|aav}} word family; see {{och-l|亮}} for more.

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[bright]]; [[clear]]
# [[frank]]; [[straightforward]]
# [[refreshing]]; [[pleasurable]]; [[invigorating]]
#: {{zh-x|太 爽 了！|This is so '''good'''!}}
# [[happy]]; [[cheerful]]; [[joyful]]
# {{lb|zh|of health}} [[well]]; to [[feel]] well
# to [[deviate]]; to make [[mistake]]; to [[miss]]
# to [[violate]]; to [[breach]]; to [[break]]
